Note: Initial "H." appears on the bottom right of the illustration. Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text encourages recruitment for the U.S. Marines. "Teufel hunden" is the German nickname for the U.S. Marines. Illustration shows one dog chasing another.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : publisher not identified
